entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Your whacky ass will say and do anything in an attempt to distract from your FAILED leadership, 2,794,687 COVID-19 cases, 130,855 deaths, and Russia’s solicitation to murder American military servicemen/women. You’re out of there in November 2020!
